Thank you very much.<wait><page> Huh? This isn't going to fit. I'll just send it to you later, okay?<wait>
Ah, you don't have enough gold. We can't give away medicine for free, I'm afraid. Sorry.<wait>
Oh, it doesn't look like you can carry any more. Could you free up some space?<wait>
You don't want to buy anything else?<wait>
You're not buying anything? If you're tired, you mustn't overwork yourself, okay?<wait>
Buying anything else?<wait>
Yes, here you are. Take care.<wait>
Oh, it doesn't look like you can hold any more. I'll send this to your house later.<wait>
Oh, it looks like you don't have room for all of these. I'll send the rest to you later.<wait>
Plain old water.
Only sold at the Inn during the day.<wait>
A tall glass of fresh cow Milk.
Looks like you're short on gold. Try to bring more next time.<wait>
What, you sure? I'll take your order any time.<wait>
Thanks! Wait just a sec... Here you are!<wait>
Hmph. Your gold does not add up. You can't pull the wool over my eyes!<wait>
Your hands are quite full of equipment already, yes? Being greedy will not get you anywhere. <wait>
You are carrying much as it is, yes? Being greedy will not get you anywhere, you know.<wait>
Is there nothing else that catches your eye? I'll give you a special deal!<wait>
...Are you one of those window-shopper people?<wait>
Are you going to purchase anything else?<wait>
My thanks! Gratitude! Xie xie! Come again!<wait>
My thanks, come again-- Ah! Your Bag is full, yes?<wait><page> I will send it to your home later. How is that for service?<wait>
My thanks, come again-- Ah! Your Bag is full, yes?<wait><page> I will send it to your home later. How is that for service?<wait>
My thanks, come again-- Ah! It won't all fit in your Bag, yes?<wait><page> I will send it to your home later. How is that for good service?<wait>
My thanks, come again-- Ah! It won't all fit in your Bag, yes?<wait><page> I will send it to your home later. How is that for good service?<wait>
My, my. You don't have enough gold. You're a cheeky one, aren't you?<wait>
I'm glad you're buying something, but if you can't carry it, there's nothing I can do.<wait>
Thanks. Be sure to drop by again, you hear!<wait>
If you want to buy anything, just come tell me.<wait>
Thanks again.<wait>
Anything else tickle your fancy?<wait>
Thanks. Oh? Looks like you have your hands full as it is.<wait><page> That's fine. I'll have my husband bring the rest to you later.<wait>
Thanks. Oh? Looks like you have your hands full as it is.<wait><page> That's fine. I'll have my husband bring the rest to you later.<wait>
A device that plays records.
Thank you for your patronage. I'll have it delivered to your Cabinet later.<wait>
Will you be buying anything else?<wait>
Hrm. I'm afraid your funds are a bit lacking at the moment.<wait>
Thank you very much. The Record Player is heavy, so I will have it sent to your house.<wait>
Thank you very much. I hope I can count on your continued support.<wait>
Thank you very much. Ah, a moment. It seems as though it won't fit. I will have it sent to your house.<wait>
Thank you very much.<wait>
Unfortunately, it seems you're a bit overburdened at the moment and have no room for this.<wait>
An Italian noodle dish.
A frozen dessert made of finely crushed ice.
Hold up. You don't got enough gold!<wait>
All righty, then. Oh, if you want another bite to eat, just give me a holler.<wait>
Okay, just a sec... And here ya go. Sorry for the wait. Go on an' eat up!<wait>
I'll start the expansion work on my own. Pay me no mind.<wait>
Oh, and anything you've got displayed will just get in my way, so I'll set it aside for you.<wait>
What, you sure?<wait>
Thanks.<wait>
You don't have enough gold.<wait>
Will you be buying something else?<wait>
Oh, you sure?<wait>
If you want to buy anything, just come talk to me again, all right?<wait>
All right, I'll put the Fodder in your Silo. Come again.<wait>
Your Silo is already full of Fodder.<wait>
Come again. Oh. Looks like you're already full up on equipment. I'll send it to your house later.<wait>
Come again. Oh. Looks like the equipment won't all fit.<wait><page> I'll send it on to your house later, all right?<wait>
Hrm? Looks like the equipment won't fit.<wait>
Well then, go on and name it.<wait>
Then I'll put it in your Barn. Come again.<wait>
Your Barn is full.<wait>
You don't have a cow that you can sell.<wait>
You don't have a sheep that you can sell.<wait>
G all right for you?
Oh yeah?<wait><page> Well then...
I'll take it from the Barn on your farm.<wait>
Up to 30 items can fit in this Basket, which you can then ship to your Shipping Bin. This can also be equipped on your horse.<wait>
Basic Bag
Capacity: 16 Items 8 Tools
Big Bag
Capacity: 24 Items 12 Tools
Knife
Allows you to make food requiring a Knife.
Frying Pan
Allows you to make food requiring a Frying Pan.
Pot
Allows you to make food requiring a Pot.
Mixer
Allows you to make food requiring a Mixer.
Whisk
Allows you to make food requiring a Whisk.
Rolling Pin
Allows you to make food requiring a Rolling Pin.
Oven
Allows you to make food requiring an Oven.
Seasoning Set
Allows you to make food requiring a Seasoning Set.
Power Berry
Eating it will increase your maximum Stamina by 15.
Copper Hoe
Tills a larger area than the Hoe from the mayor.
Silver Hoe
Tills a larger area than the Copper Hoe.
Golden Hoe
Tills a larger area than the Silver Hoe.
Mithril Hoe
Tills a larger area than the Golden Hoe.
Mythic Hoe
Tills a larger area than the Cursed/Blessed Hoe.
Copper Sickle
Cuts a larger area than the Sickle from the mayor.
Silver Sickle
Cuts a larger area than the Copper Sickle.
Golden Sickle
Cuts a larger area than the Silver Sickle.
Mithril Sickle
Cuts a larger area than the Golden Sickle.
Mythic Sickle
Cuts a larger area than the Cursed/Blessed Sickle.
Copper Axe
Can break stumps that the Axe from the mayor couldn't.
Silver Axe
Breaks stumps faster than the Copper Axe.
Golden Axe
Breaks stumps faster than the Silver Axe.
Mithril Axe
Breaks stumps faster than the Golden Axe.
Mythic Axe
Exhausts half the Stamina of the Cursed/Blessed Axe, and breaks all stumps in the area in one swing.
Copper Hammer
Can break bigger stones than the Hammer from the mayor.
Silver Hammer
Can break boulders that the Copper Hammer couldn't.
Golden Hammer
Can break boulders faster than the Silver Hammer.
Mithril Hammer
Can break boulders faster than the Golden Hammer.
Mythic Hammer
Destroys everything in the area with one swing.
Copper Watering Can
Waters a larger area than the Watering Can from the mayor.
Silver Watering Can
Waters a larger area than the Copper Watering Can.
Golden Watering Can
Waters a larger area than the Silver Watering Can.
Mithril Watering Can
Waters a larger area than the Golden Watering Can.
Mythic Watering Can
Waters a larger area than the Cursed/Blessed Watering Can.
Copper Fishing Rod
Easier to catch medium-sized fish than with the Fishing Rod from Zack.
Silver Fishing Rod
Easier to catch medium-sized fish than with the Copper Fishing Rod.
Golden Fishing Rod
Easier to catch large fish than with the Silver Fishing Rod.
Mithril Fishing Rod
Easier to catch large fish than with the Golden Fishing Rod.
Mythic Fishing Rod
Catches Guardian-class fish and rare items at twice the rate of the Cursed/Blessed Fishing Rod.
Mayonnaise Maker
The quality of the Egg used will determine the size of the Mayonnaise.
Cheese Maker
The quality of the Milk used will determine the size of the Cheese.
Yarn Maker (Coop)
The quality of the Wool/Fur/Fleece used will determine the size of the Yarn.
Yarn Maker (Barn)
The quality of the Wool/Fur/Fleece used will determine the size of the Yarn.
Butter Maker
Add Milk to make Butter.
Slightly Bigger House
A house with a bit more room than the current one. Comes with a Kitchen.
Big House
A house much bigger than the current one. Can fit a Big Bed in it.
Bathroom
Going inside will help recover Stamina and relieve Fatigue. Takes 30 minutes.
Coop
Expand to fit 8 animals.
Barn
Expand to fit 16 animals.
Water Mill
For storing Chicken/Rabbit Feed. Can hold up to 9,999 units.
Silo
For storing Fodder. Can hold up to 9,999 units.
Field Level 2
Increases the chances of harvesting higher quality crops.
Field Level 3
Increases the chances of harvesting higher quality crops more than a Level 2 field.
Field Level 4
Increases the chances of harvesting higher quality crops more than a Level 3 field.
Field Level 5
Increases the chances of harvesting higher quality crops more than a Level 4 field.
Apple Tree
Produces Apples in summer and autumn. Occasionally produces Honey.
Grape Tree
Produces Grapes in spring and summer. Occasionally produces Honey.
Orange Tree
Produces Oranges in autumn and winter. Occasionally produces Honey.
Town Villa
Can be built in the south part of town. It's nice to treat yourself sometimes.
Square Windows
Changes Window shape to square. Comes with attractive shutters.
Square Windows
Changes Window shape to square without shutters.
Round Windows
Changes Window shape to round.
Red Mailbox
Turns your Mailbox red.
Blue Mailbox
Turns your Mailbox blue.
Weird Mailbox
Turns your Mailbox into a unique shape.
Clock
Allows you to check the time.
Fridge
Can store crops and food.
Big Fridge
Can store more than the basic Fridge.
Deluxe Fridge
Can store even more than the Big Fridge.
Big Cabinet
Can store more than the basic Cabinet.
Deluxe Cabinet
Can store even more than the Big Cabinet.
Rug
Lay it on the floor to add a bit of style to your home.
Big Bed
Necessary to have a bigger family.
Normal Wallpaper
Wallpaper that's as basic as it gets.
Zigzag Wallpaper
Wallpaper with a playful design.
Blue Wallpaper
Wallpaper with a touch of class.
Normal Floor
Flooring without much going on.
Refined Floor
Flooring with a bit of style.
Tiled Floor
Flooring with a chessboard-like pattern.
LCD TV
A TV with a large screen. Now you can say goodbye to that ancient CRT screen.
Water
Plain old water.
Daily Special
Sold at the Inn, but only during the day.
Milk
A tall glass of fresh cow Milk.
Spaghetti
An Italian noodle dish.
Shaved Ice
A frozen dessert made of finely crushed ice.
Chicken
Lays an Egg every day.
Brown Chicken
A chicken with dark plumage. Lays an Egg every day.
Angora Rabbit
A rabbit with a long coat. When you shear it, you'll get Fur.
Rabbit Breeding Kit
Makes adult Angora rabbits pregnant.
Calf
Once it matures, it'll start producing Milk.
Coffee Calf
Once it matures, it'll start producing Coffee Milk.
Strawberry Calf
Once it matures, it'll start producing Strawberry Milk.
Fruit Calf
Once it matures, it'll start producing Fruit Milk.
Sheep
Shear it to get Wool.
Alpaca
Shear it to get Fleece.
Record Player
A device that plays records. Once you buy it, you can put it in your house.
All BGM
Enables you to listen to all of the background music.
Mineral Dog
A unique-looking dog.
Black Shiba
A Shiba Inu with a black coat.
Papillon
A dog with distinctive ears and long fur.
American Shorthair
A cat notable for the M-pattern on its forehead.
Bengal
A cat with a distinctive spotted coat.
Calico
A cat with white, brown, and black fur.
Penguin
An aquatic, flightless bird with blue coloring.
Navy Penguin
An aquatic, flightless bird with navy coloring.
Capybara
A large rodent with short brown fur.
White Capybara
A large rodent with short white fur.

A lot of farms want healthy animals. I'll find a good home for it, so don't worry.<wait>

Oh dear. One of your animals is about to give birth, so you won't have any room in your Coop.
Oh dear. Your Coop is already full up with animals and an incubating Egg.
Oh dear. You've got animals ready to give birth and an Egg incubating. There's no room in your Coop.

Boy
Girl
Name
Birthday
Difficulty
Simple Mode
Normal Mode
- Start with a lot of gold. - Items sell for a little more gold. - Easier to raise affection with people. - Start with 18 Turnips in the field.
- None of the features from Simple Mode that make the game easier. - Offers a satisfying challenge.
Spring
Summer
